commands.name: beers
commands.description: Sends an embed with a gif of cheers

commands.name: beg
commands.description: Sends a random gif of someone begging

commands.name: bite
commands.description: Sends a random gif of someone being bitten

commands.name: cake
commands.description: Sends a random gif of cake

commands.name: cookie
commands.description: Gives a cookie to someone

commands.name: cuddle
commands.description: Sends a random gif of someone being cuddled

commands.name: gif
commands.description: Finds a random gif with the given search term

commands.name: glare
commands.description: Sends a random gif of someone glaring

commands.name: highfive
commands.description: Sends a random gif of a high five

commands.name: hug
commands.description: Sends a random gif of someone being hugged

commands.name: kiss
commands.description: Sends a random gif of someone being kissed

commands.name: lick
commands.description: Sends a random gif of someone being licked

commands.name: muffin_button
commands.description: Sends a DBZA meme of the muffin button

commands.name: pat
commands.description: Sends a random gif of someone being pat

commands.name: poke
commands.description: Sends a random gif of someone being poked

commands.name: punch
commands.description: Sends a random gif of someone being punched

commands.name: sass
commands.description: Sends a random gif of someone being sassy

commands.name: shank
commands.description: Sends a random gif of someone being stabbed

commands.name: slap
commands.description: Sends a random gif of someone being slapped

commands.name: blacklist
commands.description: Blacklists the channel or the user from using anon commands

commands.name: send
commands.description: Sends a message anonymously in the given channel

commands.name: whitelist
commands.description: Whitelists the channel or the user from using anon commands

commands.name: language
commands.description:
Sets the language for either the user or the guild.
Valid languages are:

commands.name: define
commands.description: Gets a definition for the given word and a couple of synonyms

commands.name: dice
commands.description: Rolls a dice with the amount of sides given. Default is a normal 6-sided dice

commands.name: general_kenobi
commands.description: Sends a gif from Star Wars

commands.name: hello_there
commands.description: Sends an embed with a Star Wars gif on it

commands.name: invite
commands.description: Sends the user an embed with an invite link. Please add me to all your favourite servers

commands.name: joke
commands.description: Sends a random joke to the chat

commands.name: meme
commands.description: Sends a random meme

commands.name: nani
commands.description: Sends an anime joke response

commands.name: omae
commands.description: Gives an anime joke

commands.name: pfp
commands.description: Sends an embed with the user's pfp along with a clickable link to it

commands.name: prefix
commands.description: Changes the prefix for the guild

commands.name: support
commands.description: Sends an embed with the invite link to the official support server

commands.name: ban
commands.description: Bans the user from the server

commands.name: channel
commands.description: Sets the channel to send audit log data

commands.name: clear
commands.description: Clears the specified amount of messages from the channel. Default is 5

commands.name: editwelcome
commands.description: Edits the message of the welcome embeds

commands.name: info
commands.description: Gives relevant info about the server

commands.name: kick
commands.description: Kicks the user from the server

commands.name: settings
commands.description:
Command to toggle on and off different settings for the bot.
Settings to change:
	`Audits`
	`Welcome`

commands.name: unban
commands.description: Unbans the user from the server. Uses the user ID

commands.name: warn
commands.description: Warns the user with the given reason

commands.name: welcome
commands.description: Sets the channel to send welcome messages

commands.name: join
commands.description: Makes the bot join your current voice channel

commands.name: leave
commands.description: Makes the bot leave your current voice channel

commands.name: nowplaying
commands.description: Shows the currently playing song

commands.name: pause
commands.description: Pauses the currently playing song

commands.name: play
commands.description: Plays the given song or adds it to the queue if the player is already playing a song

commands.name: queue
commands.description: Shows the current queue

commands.name: repeat
commands.description: Sets the repeat for the song or queue

commands.name: resume
commands.description: Makes the bot resume playing the music

commands.name: skip
commands.description: Skips the currently playing song to the next in queue

commands.name: stop
commands.description: Stops the music and clears the queue

commands.name: volume
commands.description: Sets the volume for the music playing

commands.name: reminder
commands.description: Shows your reminders or adds/removes one from the list

subcommands.name: add
subcommands.description: Adds a new reminder to the list

subcommands.name: remove
subcommands.description: Removes the reminder from the list

commands.name: joinrole
commands.description: Sets the role to add to newly joined members and enables it. Using this with no role will disable it

commands.name: reactroles
commands.description: Adds or removes react roles from a specific message

subcommands.name: add
subcommands.description: Adds a react role to the given message

subcommands.name: remove
subcommands.description: Removes a react role from the given message

commands.name: roledm
commands.description: Toggles the DM settings for role reactions. By default this is enabled

commands.name: roletoggle
commands.description: Sets whether roles on this message id toggle on or off
